name: Facial Synthesia Instrument
description:
Short synthesia quirky face instrumental game. Try this new instrument! Please press the fullscreen button for best resolution. 

Mash random keys to try to find what to play...

if you are no fun then try 

WASD-

ARROW KEYS-

BRACKETS-

ENTER&RIGHTSHIFT-

CAPSLOCK&LEFTSHIFT-

SPACEBAR&LEFTALT
